# Keyring

Location in GUI:
`Admin` » `AAA` » `Security` » `Public Key Management` » `Key Rings`

### Terraform modules

* [Keyring](https://registry.terraform.io/modules/netascode/keyring/aci/latest)

{{ aac_doc }}

### Examples

```yaml
apic:
  fabric_policies:
    aaa:
      key_rings:
        - name: KEYRING1
          ca_certificate: CA1
          certificate: |
```
